definition: surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy
back of neck/item/thing/term (in a mathematical formula)/sum (of money)/classifier for principles, items, clauses, tasks, research projects etc

sentences.english: The cognition frequency of the single item is often unbalanced in the ambiguity structure.
sentences.chinese: 歧義結構單義項的認知理解頻率往往是不平衡的。

sentences.english: Originally the word medium has multiple meanings, it refers only to the carrier in the activity of information spreading.
sentences.chinese: 媒介的原來義項較多，後專指信息傳播活動中的載體。
